content:
Does anyone have a recommendation for a book on Rust?

I assume there arenâ€™t any books on Zig (yet) but I found https://ziglang.org/documentation/master/ and https://github.com/ratfactor/ziglings which both seem quite useful.
But maybe there are other recommendations?

Thanks!
The official rust book is pretty good: https://doc.rust-lang.org/book/
Recommendations (or stuff to stay away from) for resources on C in general would also be greatly appreciated!
